BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-BasicActions
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Basic actions for user-defined specifier names
BundleInfo.Description:
Manager for user-defined specifier names.
Names are listed and may be used to display, hide or color associated atoms, cartoons and surfaces.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Tool :: Basic Actions :: General :: show/hide atoms, ribbons and surfaces
Command :: name :: General :: Define specifier name as a string
Command :: name frozen :: General :: Define specifier name as atoms in current session matching a string
Command :: name delete :: General :: Remove user-defined specifier name
Command :: name list :: General :: List user-defined specifier names
